google_translated: Aim for the grave of awake

en_text:
Mogaki Wakare Yamiyo no yume
The life, the death,
the dream of darkness
jp_text: 生(もがき) 死(わかれ) 闇夜の夢
google_translated: Raw  Death  Darkness of the dark night

en_text:
Wakiagaru kibou utae
Sing for the hope
that gushes forth
jp_text: 湧きあがる希望 歌え！

en_text:
The wind blows and
whirls about.
jp_text: 外してあげて その鍵を

en_text:
The voice calling out
is as if from a dream.
jp_text: 呼んでる声は夢うつつ

en_text:
Because he is cold.
Because he is lonely.
jp_text: 寂しいから 辛いから
google_translated: Because it is painful because it is lonely

en_text:
Because he is suffering.
Because he loves you.
jp_text: 愛しているから

en_text:
Your pancreatic juice
is overflowing.
jp_text: あなたの髄液

en_text: Next Episode... Revelation
jp_text: 溢れ出る
